entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

Application Description

MagicKit AI ‚Äì Kit de Ferramentas Tudo-em-Um para o Seu Dispositivo O MagicKit AI √© um aplicativo utilit√°rio completo, projetado para ajud√°-lo a monitorar seu dispositivo, otimizar o desempenho e acessar ferramentas do dia a dia em uma interface pr√°tica. Desenvolvido especialmente para iOS, o MagicKit AI re√∫ne funcionalidades essenciais enquanto protege sua privacidade e economiza bateria. Ferramentas do Dispositivo e do Sistema ‚Ä¢ Status da Bateria: Veja o n√≠vel de carga e o estado atual da bateria ‚Ä¢ Uso de Armazenamento: Analise o espa√ßo usado e dispon√≠vel ‚Ä¢ Informa√ß√µes do Dispositivo: Verifique detalhes do hardware e do sistema ‚Ä¢ Tempo de Atividade: Monitore h√° quanto tempo o dispositivo est√° ligado ‚Ä¢ Dicas de Bateria: Receba conselhos √∫teis para melhorar o uso da bateria ‚Ä¢ Limpeza de Fotos: Detecte e remova fotos duplicadas ou semelhantes ‚Ä¢ Limpeza de Contatos: Organize contatos removendo duplicatas e entradas incompletas ‚Ä¢ Gerenciador de RAM: Monitore o uso da mem√≥ria e otimize o desempenho ‚Ä¢ Teste de Benchmark: Avalie o desempenho de CPU, GPU, mem√≥ria e rede Ferramentas de Rede ‚Ä¢ Teste de Velocidade: Me√ßa a velocidade da conex√£o com a internet ‚Ä¢ Informa√ß√µes do Wi-Fi: Veja nome da rede, IP e status da conex√£o ‚Ä¢ Consulta de IP: Verifique a geolocaliza√ß√£o de endere√ßos IP p√∫blicos ‚Ä¢ Informa√ß√µes de Localiza√ß√£o: Acompanhe GPS, velocidade, dire√ß√£o e altitude Seguran√ßa e Privacidade ‚Ä¢ Gerador de Senhas: Crie senhas fortes e seguras com op√ß√µes personaliz√°veis ‚Ä¢ Gerador de Frases de Acesso: Crie frases memor√°veis e seguras ‚Ä¢ Gerador de UUID: Crie identificadores √∫nicos em v√°rios formatos ‚Ä¢ Gerador de PIN Seguro: Gere c√≥digos PIN seguros com v√°rias op√ß√µes ‚Ä¢ E-mail Tempor√°rio: Crie e-mails descart√°veis para proteger sua privacidade Ferramentas Utilit√°rias ‚Ä¢ Conversor de Unidades: Converta entre diferentes unidades de medida ‚Ä¢ Conversor de Moeda e Cripto: Veja taxas de c√¢mbio em tempo real para moedas e criptomoedas ‚Ä¢ Calculadora de Datas: Calcule diferen√ßas entre datas com suporte para dias √∫teis ‚Ä¢ Conversor de Fuso Hor√°rio: Converta hor√°rios com atualiza√ß√µes ao vivo e suporte a hor√°rio de ver√£o ‚Ä¢ Contagem Regressiva e Lembretes: Crie contagens regressivas personalizadas com lembretes e eventos recorrentes ‚Ä¢ Contador M√°gico: Acompanhe m√∫ltiplos contadores com estat√≠sticas e sequ√™ncias ‚Ä¢ Leitor de QR Code: Escaneie c√≥digos QR instantaneamente ‚Ä¢ Scanner de Documentos e Cart√µes: Capture e salve digitaliza√ß√µes com reconhecimento de texto via IA ‚Ä¢ B√∫ssola e N√≠vel: Me√ßa dire√ß√£o e n√≠vel usando os sensores do dispositivo ‚Ä¢ Travar Orienta√ß√£o: Trave a orienta√ß√£o da tela ao usar o app ‚Ä¢ Medidor de √Åudio: Me√ßa n√≠veis de som ao redor com o microfone ‚Ä¢ Gerenciador de √Årea de Transfer√™ncia: Acesse e gerencie textos copiados durante a sess√£o ‚Ä¢ Lanterna e Brilho: Ative a lanterna e ajuste o brilho da tela ‚Ä¢ Bloco de Notas: Crie, organize e gerencie notas com categorias e backup no iCloud ‚Ä¢ Gerador Universal: Gere dados aleat√≥rios como texto, n√∫meros, datas e mais Destaques ‚Ä¢ Interface limpa e f√°cil de usar com ferramentas assistidas ‚Ä¢ Se√ß√£o de Ferramentas em Destaque com as mais populares ‚Ä¢ Sem an√∫ncios ou compras no aplicativo ‚Ä¢ Leve e eficiente no uso de bateria ‚Ä¢ Compat√≠vel com todos os dispositivos iOS ‚Ä¢ Atualiza√ß√µes frequentes com novas ferramentas ‚Ä¢ Desenvolvido com foco em privacidade e desempenho ‚Ä¢ Suporte para tema claro/escuro com anima√ß√µes suaves Perfeito para: ‚Ä¢ Monitorar e otimizar o dispositivo ‚Ä¢ Medi√ß√µes e convers√µes do dia a dia ‚Ä¢ Escanear documentos e QR Codes ‚Ä¢ Limpar fotos e contatos duplicados ‚Ä¢ Criar privacidade ‚Ä¢ Tomar notas r√°pidas e organizadas Baixe o MagicKit AI hoje mesmo e simplifique suas tarefas di√°rias com um kit inteligente e poderoso.

entry.title: Cyber Manhunt
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö5,99¬†‚Ç¨ ‚Üí 2,99¬†‚Ç¨ [2,99¬†‚Ç¨ ~ 5,99¬†‚Ç¨]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö2,99¬†‚Ç¨

Compras integradas

  • Hello World!Ôºö0,99¬†‚Ç¨
  • Home Sweet HomeÔºö0,99¬†‚Ç¨

Application Description

Cyber Manhunt is a Cyber-Style, Realistic- Society theme, Story-Rich indie game. The game taked place in the Republic of Alivia with some different theme stories ,but the fate of the characters is closely related in there. It will focus on social issues liking big data, hacking, citizen privacy etc... We want to reveal the profound themes behind the stories with wonderful plots and gamification. And let players pay more attention to Cyber Violence and Privacy Breaches. [Contents] ‚óÜChapter I: Death of a Programmer The CEO of a company committed suicide by jumping off a building, and claimed that he was extorted tens of millions by his wife. While his wife posted photos of domestic violence on social networks. Who is lying? ‚óÜChapter II: Invisible Eyes The indecent video of the female college student went viral on the Internet. At this moment, she was already socially dead. Who is the initiator? Who should protect the safety of women? ‚óÜChapter III: The Evidence Vanishes The student council president, who is both excellent in character and study, suddenly disappeared. The bullying incident made the case more complicated. Who is the murderer and who is the victim? ‚óÜChapter IV: The Price of Humiliation The female singer has been exposed again! Threatening letters, hype, the suicide of former girl group members... The Internet has set off a public opinion carnival again! ‚óÜChapter V: Immortal Code When the society is in madness, are you willing to join the Immortal Code to obtain true love and immortality? ‚óÜDLC: Home Sweet Home Behind this seemingly sweet and happy family, everyone has their own secrets, what is the truth hidden behind?! ‚óÜDLC: Hello World! Senior researcher of Titan Dr. Lucrezia died in a terrible car accident on the spot, but the fellow Benjamin took escape from death. But he did not realize that he was about to be involved in a huge conspiracy‚Ä¶ [Features] ‚óÜHighly Immersive: Gamers play as a hacker in the game, accepts the commission of the company, and solve dangerous incidents. ‚óÜRich Gameplay: There are lots of features of Social Engineering in the game, which is including Detecting, Tracking, Puzzles-Solving, Destroying and Hacking etc.. ‚óÜWonderful Plots: Each chapter in the game will reflect a current hot social topic, such as: Sneak Shot, Cyber Violence, School Bullying, etc... ‚óÜMultiple Roles: There are many different roles in this game with a flash of personality. Their stories would be dug by yourself. ‚óÜFully Dubbing: All the characters in the game have their own voice actors that make the game experience more immersive. ‚óÜOriginal Music: There are some original songs in the game, and the lyrics and vocals are all completed by the studio. [Gameplay] ‚óÜWeb Search: You should collect basic information about the targets through the Internet search. ‚óÜDatabase: You can use the database to get deep information about targets. ‚óÜCrack: You would get passwords based on the obtained target's information, and use it to log in to accounts of different platforms. ‚óÜChat: The exciting thing is that you need to chat with targets by disguise and use the information to get the trust of the target. ‚óÜPhishing: You can send phishing links to hack the targets' hardware devices, and get private information. ‚óÜPicture Analysis: You can get valuable information and relevant clues from pictures. More advanced hacking methods will be unlocked later!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Walden - Calendar/ToDo/Notes
entry.content:
Discount Information

Compras integradas

  • Lifetime MembershipÔºö14,99¬†‚Ç¨ ‚Üí 9,99¬†‚Ç¨ [8,99¬†‚Ç¨ ~ 14,99¬†‚Ç¨]

All Price Information

PriceÔºöGratuito

Compras integradas

  • Quarterly MembershipÔºö2,99¬†‚Ç¨
  • Lifetime - EducationÔºö9,99¬†‚Ç¨
  • Âπ¥Â∫¶‰ºöÂëòÂçáÁ∫ßÁªàË∫´‰ºöÂëòÔºö9,99¬†‚Ç¨
  • Yearly MembershipÔºö3,99¬†‚Ç¨
  • Monthly MembershipÔºö0,99¬†‚Ç¨
  • Âπ¥Â∫¶‰ºöÂëòÔºö3,99¬†‚Ç¨
  • ÊúàÂ∫¶‰ºöÂëòÔºö0,99¬†‚Ç¨
  • Lifetime MembershipÔºö9,99¬†‚Ç¨

Application Description

Walden is an App focused on personal management, carefully designed to bring users only a quality experience, hope you like it. Function Introduction To-Do List Integrate the four quadrants of work, according to the priority of the task rational scheduling. Support repeat schedule and reminders. Pomodoro Walden's built-in tomato clock is designed strictly according to the tomato work method You can set daily tomato clock goals, rest time, and select the tasks to focus on from the to-do list Progress Management Quantify your goals, support goal grouping and progress notes, with a simple and beautiful progress bar, clearly track your goal progress. Flash Notes Integrate custom tags, support full-text search and display by tags. In our daily life, there will always be a moment of light and whimsy, it can be the emotion after reading a text, it can be the resonance of listening to a song, or simply want to record the moment's thoughts. If you are like me and want to practice writing long articles, then you can start by writing a paragraph every day and gradually improve your writing skills day by day. ----------------- Subscription Instructions --Subscription period: 1 month, 1 year (non-automatic renewal, please feel free to purchase) -- Payment: Payment will be deducted through the user's iTunes account, and payment will be made once the user confirms the purchase. --User Terms: http://freelancer-x.com/app-terms/ -- Privacy Policy: http://freelancer-x.com/app-privacy-policy/

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

O aplicativo exibe o endere√ßo da web ou URL da p√°gina de transmiss√£o ao vivo. O URL cont√©m o endere√ßo IP do seu iPhone onde o aplicativo est√° sendo executado. Basta abrir um navegador no seu computador, outro smartphone ou tablet, navegar at√© a p√°gina e come√ßar a assistir. N√£o √© necess√°ria conex√£o com a Internet, apenas o Wi-Fi dom√©stico √© usado.

entry.title: Incredibox
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö4,99¬†‚Ç¨ ‚Üí 0,99¬†‚Ç¨ [0,99¬†‚Ç¨ ~ 4,99¬†‚Ç¨]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö0,99¬†‚Ç¨

Application Description

O Incredibox permite que voc√™ crie sua pr√≥pria m√∫sica com a ajuda de uma equipe divertida de beatboxers. Escolha seu estilo musical para come√ßar a criar, gravar e compartilhar suas mixagens. Entre no ritmo com batidas de hip-hop, electro waves, vozes de pop, swing jazzy, ritmos brasileiros e muito mais. Al√©m disso, descubra uma sele√ß√£o de mods criados pela comunidade. Muita coisa para voc√™ mixar por horas, sem propagandas ou microtransa√ß√µes. Parte jogo, parte ferramenta, o Incredibox √© acima de tudo uma experi√™ncia audiovisual que se tornou um sucesso rapidamente entre pessoas de todas as idades. A combina√ß√£o certa de m√∫sica, gr√°ficos, anima√ß√£o e interatividade torna o Incredibox ideal para todo mundo. E por tornar o aprendizado divertido e interessante, o Incredibox √© usado por escolas no mundo inteiro. Como jogar? F√°cil! Arraste e solte √≠cones nos avatares para faz√™-los cantar e comece a compor sua pr√≥pria m√∫sica. Encontre as combina√ß√µes de sons certas para desbloquear refr√µes animados que v√£o aprimorar sua melodia. Assim que sua composi√ß√£o estiver boa, basta salv√°-la e compartilhar para conseguir o m√°ximo de votos poss√≠vel. Se voc√™ conseguir votos suficientes, poder√° entrar para a hist√≥ria do Incredibox ao entrar no Top 50! Est√° pronto para mostrar seu talento? √â poss√≠vel tamb√©m baixar sua mixagem como MP3 no app e ouvi-la repetidamente! Est√° com pregui√ßa de criar sua pr√≥pria mixagem? Sem problema, deixe o modo autom√°tico tocar por voc√™! Aumente o som e curta ;) **************** Incredibox, cria√ß√£o do est√∫dio So Far So Good, com sede em Lyon, na Fran√ßa, foi criado em 2009. Come√ßando como uma p√°gina da web, foi ent√£o lan√ßado como um app para celular e tablet e se tornou um sucesso imediato. Ganhou v√°rios pr√™mios e apareceu em diversas m√≠dias internacionais, incluindo: BBC, Adobe, FWA, Gizmodo, Slate, Konbini, Softonic, Kotaku, Cosmopolitan, PocketGamer, AppAdvice, AppSpy, Vice, Ultralinx e muitas outras. A demo online atraiu mais de 100 milh√µes de visitantes desde sua cria√ß√£o.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad
